metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10326 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In libosip2 in GNU oSIP 4.1.0, a malformed SIP message can lead to a heap buffer overflow in the osip_body_to_str() function defined in osipparser2/osip_body.c, resulting in a remote DoS.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10326` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libosip2-11 - 4.1.0-2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libosip2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.1.0-2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
